\resumeNormalSubheading
    {<<entry.name>>}{((* if entry.date_string == "" *))<<entry.location>>((* else *))<<entry.date_string>>((* endif *))}
((* for item in entry.highlights *))
    ((* if loop.first *))
    \resumeItemListStart
    ((* endif *))
        \resumeItem{}{<<item>>}
    ((* if loop.last *))
    \resumeItemListEnd
    ((* endif *))
((* endfor *))
